examples: it was the swimming they enjoyed most
they took a short swim in the pool
We had to swim for 20 minutes to reach the shore
a big fish was swimming in the tank

definitions.text: be afloat either on or below a liquid surface and not sink to the bottom

examples: my brain is swimming after the bottle of champagne

definitions.text: be covered with or submerged in a liquid
examples: the meat was swimming in a fatty gravy

definitions.text: move as if gliding through water
examples: this snake swims through the soil where it lives
sorrow made the eyes of many grow liquid

definitions.text: applied to a fish depicted horizontally
